metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24361 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
SNMPTT before 1.4.2 allows attackers to execute shell code via EXEC,PREXEC, or unknown_trap_exec.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24361` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

snmptt - 1.4.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: snmptt package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.2-1').
